emailCollection.title: Email Address Collection
emailCollection.description: We collect email addresses for service provision, communication, and important notifications. We will not provide email addresses to third parties without your consent.

emailUsage.title: Email Address Usage
emailUsage.description:
We use collected email addresses for the following purposes:
- Important service notifications
- Account-related information
- Security alerts
- Product updates

dataHandling.title: Personal Information Handling
dataHandling.description: We manage and protect your personal information in accordance with the law. We implement reasonable security measures against risks such as unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, and leakage.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions or inquiries about personal information handling, please contact support@battdevy.com.

changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
changes.description: We may update our privacy policy as needed. We will announce significant changes on our website or notify registered email addresses.

serviceUsage.title: Service Usage
serviceUsage.description: The BattDevy service is available only for personal and non-commercial purposes. Unauthorized use of the service or actions that infringe on other users' rights are strictly prohibited.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and managing account access. Any unauthorized access or misuse must be reported to us immediately.

prohibitedActions.title: Prohibited Actions
list: Unauthorized use or intentional destruction of the service
Invasion of other users' privacy or rights
Infringement of our intellectual property rights

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content, design, logos, and software of BattDevy belong to us or our licensors. Users must respect these intellectual property rights and are prohibited from reproducing, distributing, or modifying them without authorization.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: While we strive to provide continuous service, we are not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from service interruptions, errors, or security issues.

serviceModification.title: Service Modification and Suspension
serviceModification.description: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate all or part of the service for any reason, with prior notice to users where possible.

changes.title: Terms of Service Changes
changes.description: We may update the terms of service as needed. Significant changes will be announced on the website or notified to registered email addresses. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the latest terms.
